MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the CH3 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Guy Lane, Millway  and surrounding streets.  This is causing flickering power and low voltage to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.07PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.30PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.56PM on 19th January 2021.
